thread.title: Very nice but far from city
thread.title_full: Very nice but far from city - Review of Hyatt Regency San Francisco Airport - Burlingame, Burlingame, CA - TripAdvisor

author: Suitcaseismycloset
title: Very nice but far from city
text: I stayed at this hotel for one night on a layover. I arrived at the hotel around 3am and, naturally, was planning to get a good night's sleep. Unfortunately I was awoken at 7am by loud dance music that was coming from a "staff only" area beneath my room (possibly the kitchen or other food prep area). It went on for several minutes before I called security and it finally stopped. I cannot understand how this can happen at a hotel that bears the Hyatt brand. Disappointing.
